tool_description: Bybit p2p api of all buy and sell rows.
name: Bybit p2p API
title: Bybit p2p API

api_list.name: orders
api_list.description: Buy sell orders of Bybit p2p
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bybit-p2p-api1.p.rapidapi.com/orders/buy"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bybit-p2p-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bybit-p2p-api1.p.rapidapi.com/orders/{cup}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bybit-p2p-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
